s2.ptxt: Install the skid control sensor clamp with the bolt.

atten3.ptxt: Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.

s2.ptxt: Install the speed sensor with the bolt.

item.ptxt: Make sure there are no pieces of iron or other foreign matter attached to the sensor tip.
While inserting the speed sensor into the axle housing hole, do not strike or damage the sensor tip.
After installing the speed sensor, make sure there is no clearance or foreign matter between the sensor stay part and the axle housing.

atten3.ptxt: When attaching the clamps, do not twist the wire harness.

item.ptxt: Pass the sensor connector between the brake tube and axle housing before connecting it to the wire harness connector on the vehicle.
When connecting the connector, do not twist the wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Attach the connector to the skid control sensor clamp.
Install the speed sensor with the bolt.

item.ptxt: Make sure there are no pieces of iron or other foreign matter attached to the sensor tip.
While inserting the speed sensor into the axle housing hole, do not strike or damage the sensor tip.
After installing the speed sensor, make sure there is no clearance or foreign matter between the sensor stay part and the axle housing.

atten3.ptxt: When attaching the clamps, do not twist the wire harness.

item.ptxt: When connecting the connector, do not twist the wire harness.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

s2.ptxt: Check the speed sensor signal (See page ).
